Emptiness is a minimalist WordPress theme with a white background, containing mostly texts with a header image. Simple and clean, with very lightweight HTML and CSS.

http://bitpress.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/emptiness.jpg

This theme requires WordPress 2.3 or later.
It automatically recognises [http://blog.jodies.de/archiv/2004/11/13/recent-comments/ Get Recent Comments] plugin.
